00031 void PersistImpl::openFile(const char *filename)
00032 {
00033     close();
00034 
00035     size_t length = sizeof(MappedData);
00036 
00037     if (flags & private_map) mapFlags = MAP_PRIVATE;
00038     else mapFlags =  MAP_SHARED;
00039 
00040     if (flags & create_new)
00041         fd = -1;
00042     else
00043         fd = ::open(filename, O_RDWR, S_IRWXU|S_IRGRP|S_IROTH);
00044 
00045     if (fd == -1)
00046     {
00047         // File did not exist, so we create it instead
00048 
00049         fd = ::open(filename, O_CREAT|O_TRUNC|O_RDWR, S_IRWXU|S_IRGRP|S_IROTH);
00050 
00051         // TODO: A better exception
00052         if (fd == -1) throw std::runtime_error("Could not create mapping from file");
00053 
00054         // Fill up the file with zeros
00055 
00056         char c=0;
00057         lseek(fd, length-1, SEEK_SET);
00058         write(fd, &c, 1);
00059     }
00060 }
